mapper.select: select info_id, user_name, ipaddr, login_location, browser, os, status, msg, login_time from sys_logininfor where info_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_logininfor(info_id, user_name, ipaddr, login_location, browser, os, status, msg, login_time) values (#{infoId}, #{userName}, #{ipaddr}, #{loginLocation}, #{browser}, #{os}, #{status}, #{msg}, #{loginTime})

insert into sys_logininfor(info_id, user_name, ipaddr, login_location, browser, os, status, msg, login_time) values
(#{entity.infoId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.ipaddr}, #{entity.loginLocation}, #{entity.browser}, #{entity.os}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.msg}, #{entity.loginTime})

insert into sys_logininfor(info_id, user_name, ipaddr, login_location, browser, os, status, msg, login_time) values
(#{entity.infoId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.ipaddr}, #{entity.loginLocation}, #{entity.browser}, #{entity.os}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.msg}, #{entity.loginTime})
on duplicate key update info_id = values(info_id), user_name = values(user_name), ipaddr = values(ipaddr), login_location = values(login_location), browser = values(browser), os = values(os), status = values(status), msg = values(msg), login_time = values(login_time)
mapper.update:
update sys_logininfor
user_name = #{userName},
ipaddr = #{ipaddr},
login_location = #{loginLocation},
browser = #{browser},
os = #{os},
status = #{status},
msg = #{msg},
login_time = #{loginTime},
where info_id = #{infoId}
